    • 构造器详细资料

      • DbManager

        public DbManager(java.lang.String url,
                 java.lang.String driverName,
                 java.lang.String user,
                 java.lang.String pwd)
        Constructor of the database manager
        参数:
        url - database connection url
        driverName - JDBC driver name of database used
        user - login of the database connection
        pwd - password of the database connection
